analysis.summary: The recipient_address field requires an address input for TONY LIU with address completion functionality
insights: Field type is clearly 'address' based on the field name and context hint
The address_completion context indicates auto-complete or suggestion features should be available
This is likely for delivery, shipping, or mailing purposes given the 'recipient' designation
Standard address validation including street, city, state/province, postal code, and country should be applied
recommendations: Implement address auto-completion API (Google Places, MapBox, or similar) for better UX
Use multi-line or structured input fields (street line 1, street line 2, city, state/province, postal code, country)
Add validation for required components: street address, city, postal/zip code at minimum
Consider storing validated/normalized addresses to prevent delivery issues
Set this as a high priority field since recipient address is critical for delivery/fulfillment
